data.message: Whoa, I've been reading some of these posts and many are quite shallow and unsolicited. Trump's supporters were sold a ride down a river with a big hole in the bottom of the boat. They're sunk. I feel sorry for people who follow Trump like a salivating dog. Trump is an awful human being, even subhuman. I pray for peace and love to rise up and help the United States. Trump supporters are less than 1% of the world's population and Eminem/Shady/Marshall writes, raps and performs for the whole world. Peace Out! 😊🎶 😏

replies.message: FEEL SORRY FOR YOURSELF
No Chad....I don't. I do not wish Trump any harm, just to go back to his real estate business. He is not good for politics. Peace and love to you Chad. 😊
Carol Peterson...a brilliant statement !  I am older than Eminem mama but do enjoy his music and loved the latest video.
I don't believe in age. Music is just music. Peace. 😊🎵😏
Not just Trump supporters, nor does it hace to do with Trump. If you aren't for Trump he dissed you too.
Less then 1 percent,  but he won....  LMFAO you must be a math teacher.
I believe you don't believe in age lol, all your numbers are whack
What are you talking about Christopher? This has to do with Em's music. 😊
Christopher, you are really quite sarcastic, eh. Chill out dude. 🌼
I think trump is doing just fine honestly, business is booming, people are crying over nothing
It seems the evidence would suggest that Eminem is the subhuman piece of garbage. I've listened to his music for years, but I can't deny THAT. Just listen to the lyrics!

There is a difference between an entertainer/writer vs a president. Agatha Christie really doesn't kill people, although she does in her books. Violence as a form of release to heal via writing is cathartic. A president has a whole different job to accomplish Tom Olson. Also, Tommy....you are not actually correct. Wages have not gone up in 30 or more years. Peace people! 😏
Dumbest birch on the planet. Name one thing trump has done wrong
Running for president. 😊
Tell that to the stock market, Carol. The economy is flourishing and you have to be  a negative wench.

The stock market has nothing to do with who's president Dustin. I'm sorry if you don't understand that. Wages haven't gone up in 30 years. Companies are buying their own stocks to inflate the market. Smoke and mirrors Dustin, smoke and mirrors. Peace! 😊
You can see the exact moment the stock market when up. It happens to be the same time as the president was elected.
Kyle, you have a few history books to read dude. 📚📚📚
I'd like an explanation as to why the stock market is at record numbers then...since Trump has nothing to do with it.
Me too dude
History....😊
History?  That's your answer? It's growing every day. Not history, it's now and tomorrow.
Hmm...must just be magic.
Remember when bush was president and both  the Housing market and the economy tanked? He didn’t have anything to do with that huh?

Bye bye.....I hope you buy lots of stock guys. Seriously. Make lots of money. The stock market does not give you raises. Although, if you play your cards right you can make money. Just be careful though. I hope you guys do make money....I'm against capitalism. I just want wages to go up. The Dow Jones is not connected to that. Peace Out! 😊💙🎶😏
